name: Google - No more annoying scrollbar on the left
description: Removes unnecessary things, and disable scroll bar on big screens, so you don't have to move your mouse out of the left navigation bar, to scroll down the page.
additional_info: For google and google images, and only a part of this userstyle: ~ http://userstyles.org/styles/46243/custom-adfree-pages ~
css:
/* Google, Leftnav fix, no more unnecessary overflow*/
 @-moz-document

	url-prefix(https://www.google),
	url-prefix(http://www.google),
	url-prefix(https://google),
	url-prefix(http://google),
	url-prefix(www.google),
	url-prefix(google),

	url-prefix(https://www.images.google),
	url-prefix(http://www.images.google),
	url-prefix(https://images.google),
	url-prefix(http://images.google),
	url-prefix(www.images.google),
	url-prefix(images.google) {

		#leftnav		{height:auto!important}
		#leftnav:hover	{overflow: hidden!important}

		.lnsep:first-child,
		#ms,
		#bottomads,
		#taw[style="margin-right:0"]:first-child
			{display:none!important}}
